items.name: Axiom Perpetuum
explicitMods: Adds 3 to 6 Fire Damage to Spells
Adds 3 to 5 Cold Damage to Spells
Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage to Spells
5% increased Cast Speed
113% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
flavourText: The worst of Axiom were imprisoned by more than iron.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds
20% increased Skill Effect Duration
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 10% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
Buff grants +858 to Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Deals chaos damage to a single enemy, dealing more damage if they are Hexed, then removing the Hex. If the enemy was Hexed, also deals area damage to other enemies around the target, boosting damage and removing Hexes from those enemies in the same way.
explicitMods: Deals 1514 to 2271 Chaos Damage
This Spell's Cast Time is added to its Cooldown if Triggered
10% increased Area of Effect
All Damage can Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Chaos Damage with Hits is Resisted by lowest Resistance instead
40% more Damage with Ailments if Enemy is Hexed

100% more Damage with Hits if Enemy is Hexed
Removes a Hex after Damaging

items.name: Circle of Anguish
explicitMods: +28 to Strength
Adds 21 to 33 Fire Damage
+29% to Fire Resistance
59% increased Fire Damage while affected by Herald of Ash
Herald of Ash has 45% increased Buff Effect
flavourText: I condemned an innocent man to the pyres, but to admit this mistake is to condemn myself.
My only choice is to strive harder.

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Volatile Dead Gems
+12% to all Elemental Resistances
14% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Items and Gems have 15% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."

items.name: The Stampede
explicitMods: 127% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
37% increased Stun and Block Recovery
51% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills
34% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while moving
Your Movement Speed is 150% of its base value
flavourText: <default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: +0.5 metres to radius
You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 25% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 11% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Trap, Mine, Spell, Minion, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.
explicitMods: 28% increased Minion Movement Speed
Minions have 7% increased Chill Effect
Minions have 7% increased Shock Effect
Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
14% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 10% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Annihilating Light
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: 60% reduced Elemental Resistances
Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills
flavourText: There is no force more destructive in the heavens
than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have a 100% chance to grant a Power Charge when slain
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +1.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +49% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies grant 600 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 80 Mana when Killed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have -36% to Fire Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Ignite
Ignite on Cursed enemies has 6% increased Duration
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, mines or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods:
Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 461 Mana on
Upfront Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill

Arcane Surge grants 20% increased Cast Speed
Arcane Surge grants 60% increased Mana Regeneration rate
Arcane Surge lasts 4 seconds
Supported Skills deal 25% more Spell Damage while you have Arcane Surge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Skin of the Lords
enchantMods: Grants +1% to Fire Resistance per 2% Quality
explicitMods: Sockets cannot be modified
+2 to Level of Socketed Gems
100% increased Global Defences
You can only Socket Corrupted Gems in this item
Avatar of Fire
flavourText: The Lords are chosen so carefully.
Only they may grace His flesh.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
explicitMods: Base duration is 1.40 seconds
Deals 407 to 610 Fire Damage
One impact every 0.15 seconds
First Impact has 100% more Area of Effect
First Impact deals 325% more Damage with Hits and Ailments
Maximum 3 Firestorms at a time
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Corpses near the targeted location explode, dealing damage in a small area and creating an orb which moves towards nearby enemies before dealing spell damage in a larger area. The explosion of the corpse is not affected by modifiers to spell damage, and cannot be reflected.
explicitMods: Deals 836 to 1254 Fire Damage
Consumes up to 3 corpses
Explosion deals base Fire Damage equal to 4% of the corpse's Maximum Life
Maximum of 60 Orbs at a time
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have +150% to Critical Strike Multiplier
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
